info.name: Visual Bookmarks
info.description: Alternative bookmark manager for ownCloud. Displays bookmark data visually as coloured flags and has a searchable index to lookup bookmarks by title or content type. For a roadmap of features see the github project. NOTE: Requires appframework (https://github.com/owncloud/appframework) to be installed and enabled under your /apps folder.
info.author: Daniel Givney (https://github.com/dgivney)
